story:
Once upon a time in the beautiful mountains of Tajikistan, there lived a young girl named Amina. Amina was a kind and curious girl who loved to explore the world around her.

One night, as Amina was getting ready for bed, her mother told her a magical story. It was a story of a brave fairy who lived in the tallest peak of the mountains. This fairy had the power to grant wishes to those who believed in the magic of the world.

As Amina drifted off to sleep, she dreamed of meeting the fairy and making a wish of her own. In her dream, Amina climbed to the top of the mountain, where she found the beautiful fairy waiting for her. The fairy smiled and asked Amina what her heart desired most.

Without hesitation, Amina wished for peace and happiness for her family and all the people of Tajikistan. The fairy granted her wish, and Amina woke up feeling warm and content, knowing that her wish had been granted.

From that day on, Amina carried the fairy's magic in her heart, spreading kindness and joy wherever she went. And every night, as she drifted off to sleep, Amina remembered the fairy's gift and felt grateful for the beauty and wonder of her homeland.

And so, dear little one, remember to always hold onto the magic of your dreams and the power of your wishes. For in the heart of every child lies the potential to create a world filled with love, peace, and happiness.

Goodnight, sweet child. May your dreams be as bright as the stars above.
